page.title: 20SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: The attitudes in Brynna is fairly good. We found out by sending out one hundred questionaries.We had nintey replies. The main employment in Brynna is localshops, garages, farming local pubs, welfare halls and schools. Being in such a pretty village the concerns for the elederly is fairly good.There are quite a few sheltered houses for the elederly.There is one complex .In the complex there is{27 people and 25 rooms.For enterainment they have sing_a_longs and coffee mornings and the chapal goes up on special days and sings. The aittitude towards developments is fairly good.We found most were for a{B.M.X.}track but most were against any further{housing}development.There was a mixed attitude towards{opencast {mining}developments. By {A.H.+ P.S.
